clean_data: Oracle Database Administrator II Oracle span lDatabasespan span lAdministratorspan II Oracle Database Administrator II Jelani Consulting Washington DC Database AdministratorDeveloper and Cyber Security Analyst with over 8 years of experience including database design monitoring tuning migration upgrades backup recovery cloning and security and compliance Skilled in both database management and cyber security technologies and practices including Oracle 10g 11g and 12c SQL Developer and PLSQL across Linux Windows and Unix platforms and NIST Risk Management Framework Cyber Security Framework STIGs vulnerability management SIEM EDR IPS firewall etc Proactive team player and independent contributor with excellent communication and interpersonal skills and organizational abilities Proven trackrecord of creating and implementing valueadd IT solutions Cando attitude and adept at quickly acquiring skills in company technologies Efficient and effective in deadlineoriented work environments Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience Oracle Database Administrator II Jelani Consulting Washington DC April 2017 to Present Provide daytoday support for Oracle 11204 and 122010 databases in test development and 247 production environments on Linux servers Assist developers with identification and resolution of application performancerelated issues using TOAD Review and monitor system and instance resources ie database storage memory CPU network and IO usage to ensure continuous database operations Coordinate with network and security engineers to troubleshoot database operations issues potentially related network issues or security incidents Use SQL to call and write stored procedures and custom queries against databases Coordinate and generate database requirements and testingscanning in support of NIST Risk Management Framework RMF Configure the database in Archive log mode and take incremental full and hot backups for databases in test development and production environments using RMAN script and data pump importexport utility Apply Oracles quarterly Patch Set Updates PSU using the Opatch utility to install test and deploy patches to database instances Oracle Database AdministratorDeveloper Jelani Consulting Arlington VA February 2015 to April 2017 February 2015 April 2017 Provided daytoday support for Oracle 11204 databases in 247 production environment on Red Hat Enterprise Linux servers as well as Microsoft SQL Server 2012 databases on Windows Server 2012 Managed inventory and customer database authorizations database rolesprivileges and enabled database auditing for database security Configured Oracle Transparent Data Encryption TDE to encrypt sensitive data such as customers personal and payment information Supported preparationmanagement of tables indexes tablespaces and databases to allow for growth potential and analyzed data growth trends for capacity and resource usage Monitored space utilization and optimized performance of Oracle 11g databases using Oracle Enterprise Manager Provided troubleshooting and support for enduser issues Resolved Oracle related errorsissues assigned through Remedy ticketing system Performed bulk load into databases via SQL Loader Applied Oracles quarterly Patch Set Updates PSU using the Opatch utility to install test and deploy patches to database instances Database Administrator Jelani Consulting Atlanta GA January 2011 to January 2015 Provided daytoday support for Oracle 10g and 11g databases in test development and production environments on Linux servers Implemented cold and hot backups for production and development databases Managed database security by creating and assigning appropriate roles and privileges to users and auditing user activity Supported and monitored backup and recovery for production databases Applied Oracles quarterly Patch Set Updates PSU using the Opatch utility to install test and deploy patches to database instances Resolved Oracle related errorsissues assigned through Remedy ticketing Information Systems Security Officer ISSO Cyber Security Analyst Jelani Consulting Washington DC January 2004 to December 2010 General Services Administration GSA Washington DC Information Systems Security Officer ISSO Cyber Security Analyst Contractor Jelani Consulting January 2004 December 2010 Consulted with clients Department of Justice FAA to identify and select security controls from NIST in support of the certification and accreditation process now Risk Management Framework to apply to the protection of information systems and organizations Consulted with clients USCERT Department of Labor etc to identify and investigate cyber security incidents to determine extent of compromise to information systems and coordinated or performed actions to remediate the event Education Bachelors Skills ORACLE ORACLE 10G PLSQL SQL LINUX CertificationsLicenses CompTIA Security Present
